subSubSection.paragraph: Previously known distribution: Belize, Costa Rica, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras, Mexico, Nicaragua, Panama and Peru ( Moran 1995c , Smith et al. 2005 ). Fig. 3.
Occurs as terrestrial in a fragment of Atlantic Rainforest.
This species can be recognized by petioles without conspicuous spines and with several pairs of aphlebiae toward the petiole bases ( Moran 1995c , Conant 1983 ). Fig. 2.
